ARABIC: قَالَ ٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا مَذْءُومًا مَّدْحُورًا لَّمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Get out of it, reviled and driven out. As for those of them who follow you, I will fill up Hell with every one of you.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Begone," said (God), "contemptible and rejected! As for those who follow you, I shall fill up Hell with all of you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah said: 'Go away from here - disgraced and expelled. I shall fill the Hell with all those that follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Lord told Satan, "Get out of this garden, for you are banished and despised. Hell will be filled with all of those who follow you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Exit from here, rejected, outcast; indeed whoever among them follows your bidding, I will fill hell with all of you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Allah) said (to Iblis): "Get out from this (Paradise), Madh'uman Madhura. Whoever of them (mankind) will follow you, then surely, I will fill Hell with you all."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Get out of this (state), despised, driven away; whoever of them will follow you, I will certainly fill hell with you all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said He, 'Go thou forth from it, despised and banished. Those of them that follow thee -- I shall assuredly fill Gehenna with all of you.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Go forth from hence, degraded, banished. As for such of them as follow thee, surely I will fill hell with all of you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "Get out of here, despised, and rejected! I shall fill Hell with all of those who follow you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah said: go thou forth from hence, scorned, driven away. Whosoever of them followeth thee, I will of a surety fill Hell with you all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Said He, ‘Begone hence, blameful and banished! Whoever of them follows you, I will surely fill hell with you all.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Allah) said: "Get out from this, disgraced and expelled. If any of them follow thee,- Hell will I fill with you all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah) said (to Iblis) "Get out from this (Paradise) disgraced and expelled. Whoever of them (mankind) will follow you, then surely I will fill Hell with you all."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Begone' said He, 'despised and outcast. (As for) those of them that follow you, I shall fill Gehenna (Hell) with all of you'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Get out of it, despised and vanquished. Whoever among them follows you—I will fill up Hell with you all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "Get out of Paradise, reproached and expelled. Whoever follows you among them - I will surely fill Hell with you, all together."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:18] Said He, ‘Go forth from it, degraded (read madh’ūman) disgraced or despised, and banished, removed from mercy. As for those of them, of people, who follow you (la-man, ‘as for those who’: the lām is for inceptiveness; or it is for introducing the oath, which is [the following]) I shall assuredly fill Hell with all of you’, that is, with you, through your seed, and with people — herein [in this address] those present have predominance over those absent (this [last] sentence [of the verse] expresses the sense of ‘the requital’ [suggested] in the conditional man, ‘who’: in other words, ‘whoever follows you, then I shall punish him’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: Go forth from hence, degraded) rebuked, (banished) far from good. (As for such of them) from the jinn and humans (as follow thee) obey you, (surely I will fill hell with all of you) of the disbelievers among the jinn and humans.
